vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of plumbing pipe, fittings, fixtures, trim, and parts for citywide use - i2r Solutions USA LLC in the estimated amount of $352,500.00, Epic Supply in the estimated amount of $1,033,276.00, 4-STAR Hose & Supply, Inc. in the estimated amount of $596,500.00, and Apple Specialties, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,126,600.00, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $4,108,876.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($2,818,688.93), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($981,199.59) and Aviation Fund ($308,987.48)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of plumbing pipe, fittings, fixtures, trim, and parts for citywide use - i2r Solutions USA LLC in the estimated amount of $352,500.00, Epic Supply in the estimated amount of $1,033,276.00, 4-STAR Hose & Supply, Inc. in the estimated amount of $596,500.00, and Apple Specialties, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,126,600.00, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $4,108,876.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($2,818,688.93), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($981,199.59) and Aviation Fund ($308,987.48)
